page.title: 10TRAVEL IN LIMAVADY AREA
page.content: The possession of a{car}is an important symbol of{social status,}as well as a vital means of transport. 10.5% of middle class households do not own a car but 42.9% of working class households do not own a car. Comparison of the range of travel of both classes of people shows that middle class families tend to travel much more widely than working classes Middle Class Working Class Travel To- Irish Rep. 92.1% 55.9% G.B. 94.7% 66.7% Europe 78.9% 28.9% Elsewhere 50% 42.8% in the World These differences show that{greater {wealth}has made possible a wider range of travel and experience for middle classes.
